subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
"Basra Provincial Administration able to plan public administration according to the needs of its constituents
2- Design PDS planning process and mechanisms for stakeholder Involvement
3- Assessment of development needs and priorities
4- Definition of Development Vision and Objectives
5- Identification of Development Programmes and Projects
6- Development of Implementation arrangements
7- Finalization and Communication of PDS
"
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Basra Governance Support
